definition[0]: a person or organization that is very large and powerful. This name comes from a story in the Bible. A giant (=a very big, strong man) called Goliath was killed by a boy called David, who later became King David
example[0]: How can a small computer company compete with the Goliaths of the industry?
definition[1]: an organization that is very large and powerful
example[1]: The local community was depicted in the role of David against the one of the Goliaths of the oil industry.
